content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I'm not into formalities, let's get straight to the point. The rental price I have in mind is €1000. Remember, this is just about the price, not about any additional responsibilities or conditions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the proposed rental price. At this moment, I find €1000 a bit higher than what I was expecting to pay for this unfurnished apartment in a city center location. I'm seeking a more affordable option. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm searching for a lower price range.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand. Since we didn't agree on a price, let's terminate this negotiation. Keep in mind, I don't care about your expectations or your price range. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
